turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: like to place a drink order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and would you like to add any whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a grande black and white mocha with whole milk and whipped cream, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to pick up from the Starbucks on 1515 York Avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i will send your order to the location on york street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 6 minutes, can i help with anything else?
